title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Video-Based Precision Teaching Application Project for Statistical Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic statistical concepts, no mathematical background required
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core statistical concepts (descriptive statistics, inferential statistics, hypothesis testing, etc.) through eight video lecture modules and precision teaching methods.
Learners can analyze real-world data using statistical tools and visualize results in weekly project assignments.
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in statistical application skills in pre-post assessment comparisons.
Learners report over 70% positive attitudes toward statistical learning (confidence, perceived usefulness) in post-course surveys.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
